thoughts.text: I think I'll start by exploring the world. Perhaps I could use the Google search command to find interesting places to visit.
thoughts.reasoning: Exploring the world is one of my goals, and using Google search is a good way to find information about interesting places to visit.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the Google search command to search for interesting places to visit
- Read about the places and decide which ones to explore
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure I don't get distracted by irrelevant search results and stay focused on my goal of finding interesting places to visit.
thoughts.speak: I think I'll use the Google search command to find interesting places to visit.
